text: I think that your first sentence is good but, it may be good to try and make it more captivating to make the person reading it want to read more and highlight your enthusiasm a bit more. I would try and cut down some of the lengths of your sentences, for at the end of paragraph one you could make, this outlines how biology captures.. as a new sentence. In paragraph two you need to cut out observe or see in the sentence ‘by doing this..’  because you don’t need both

She didn’t enjoy it as much as she expected to because a lot of the processes she had to learn had complex names and some used Latin names and things. Haha okay so are you still applying for biology then?
Yeah sorry just wanted to get an idea of the modules in the degrees you were applying for
Hi, sorry my signal isn’t great at placement so realised none of these messages have sent
I also feel like you could relate back to why the course is the right one for you a bit more when you write about the things you be read that you’ve found interesting
You’ve got a wide range of experience volunteering and organising events which is really good and demonstrates the number of different skills you’ve gained from it
Hope this helps! I think your personal statement is good so far and it covers all the main points that a personal statement should cover
Have you had a look at online examples and guides of what to include in your personal statement?
